elements.text:
Your car broke down so a friend is dropping you off at a meeting. As they drop you off, they are really loud and everyone in there looks at you. 

Here are some behaviors that someone might do at that moment or in the future:

texts: I feel the urge to skip the meeting, but push myself to face my fears and go in.
I start getting my notes out for the meeting.
I smile at my friend as I get out of the car.
I want to keep apologizing to the people in the meeting until I'm sure they're not mad, but I decide that one time is enough.
I avoid making eye contact with people.
